snippet: There had been speculation that the Yahoo board would finalize its choice for chief executive this week and an announcement could be made at its annual meeting on Thursday in Santa Clara, Calif. But the board is unlikely to name its pick on Thursday,...
abstract: There had been speculation that the Yahoo board would finalize its choice for chief executive this week and an announcement could be made at its annual meeting on Thursday in Santa Clara, Calif. But the board is unlikely to name its pick on Thursday, reports DealBook.
